extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
\i[arrow-n] Forest
\i[arrow-sw] Cliff
\i[arrow-s] River 
\i[arrow-e] Town Center
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
\i[arrow-n] Forêt
\i[arrow-sw] Falaise
\i[arrow-s] Rivière
\i[arrow-e] Centre-Ville

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: He had a point...
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Il a raison...

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Those cliffs really do not make any sense.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Ces falaises n'ont vraiment aucun sens.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: So...
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Donc...

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: When do you expect them to arrive?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Tu t'attends à ce qu'ils arrivent quand ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: This is none of your concern anymore.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Cela ne te concerne plus maintenant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: I will deal with this on my own.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Je vais m'occuper de ça moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: So Tronny, how unrealistic is this rock in particular?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Dis-moi, Tronny, à quel point ce rocher n'est-il pas réaliste ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: I suppose it's somewhat plausible...
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: J'imagine qu'il est un peu plausible...

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Protocol submitted
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Protocole soumis

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Avatar switched
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Avatar changé

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: What's the matter?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Quel est le problème ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
Why not?
Ice cream is great!
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Pourquoi pas ?
C'est bon les glaces !

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
I know...\. I told you 
I'm not big on sweets.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Je sais...\. Je t'ai dit
que je n'étais pas un grand fan de sucreries.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
But ice cream 
is a different matter.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Mais les glaces
c'est autre chose.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
Oh is it that 
late already?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Oh, il est
déjà si tard ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
Sorry,
I need to go.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Désolé,
Il faut que j'y aille.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: This is a message to myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Ceci est un message pour moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
It will serve as a reminder 
for my upcoming tasks.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Il servira de pense-bête
pour ma prochaine tâche.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
My main objective is to gather 
intelligence on our investigation targets 
from within the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Mon objectif principal est de récolter
des informations sur nos cibles
en étant à l'intérieur du jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
This task will require my continuous 
attendance in CrossWorlds 
for a prolonged period.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Cette tâche nécessitera une présence
continue dans CrossWorlds
pour une longue durée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: This is a message to myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Ceci est un message pour moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
When I receive it,
I will be connected to CrossWorlds
in a special manner.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Lorsque je le recevrais,
Je serais connecté à CrossWorlds
d'une manière spéciale.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
My memory is expected to be fuzzy 
as a side effect of this connection.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Il faut s'attendre à ce que ma mémoire soit trouble
comme effet secondaire de cette connexion.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
For that reason, this message serves 
as a reminder for my upcoming tasks.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Pour cette raison, ce message sert
de pense-bête pour mes tâches suivantes.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
My main objective is to gather 
intelligence on our investigation targets 
from within the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Mon objectif principal est de récolter
des informations sur nos cibles
en étant à l'intérieur du jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
This task will require my continuous 
attendance in CrossWorlds...
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Cette tâche nécessitera une présence
continue dans CrossWorlds...

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: ...for several weeks.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: ... pendant plusieurs semaines.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
She can't speak?\. 
You're kidding, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Elle ne peut pas parler ?\.
Tu blagues, hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: You heard me.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Tu m'as bien compris.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
She's the expert on the project.\.
Best person to ask.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
C'est elle, l'experte sur le projet.\.
La meilleure personne à qui demander.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
And how am I supposed to 
get any answers from her?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Et comment je suis censé
obtenir des réponses d'elle ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
In writing. She can 
do that perfectly fine.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Par écrit. Elle fait
ça très bien.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig:
Hearing as well, 
so just talk to her normally.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text:
Elle écoute très bien aussi,
donc parle simplement à elle normalement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Got it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Compris.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: She's waiting inside.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Elle t'attends à l'intérieur.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Hello Ms. Lavore.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Bonjour, Madame Lavore.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Uhm...
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Hmm...

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: It's a pleasure to meet you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Ravi de vous rencontrer !

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: My name is...
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Mon nom est...
